Articles.Content: How would I bookmark a thread so that clicking on it would take me to the last page?

The short answer is that you can't. The nearest thing we have is the goto=newpost thing, which will take you to the first post in the thread the forum doesn't think you've read yet. To do that, add ?goto=newpost to the end of a thread link.

Unfortunately, I don't think it's possible: each time you go to another page, it change the URL.

So, as bookmarking only bookmark for one URL, I think the only thing you could do is either bookmarking the first page of the thread and going manually to the last page, or bookmarking the what is the last page of the thread when you bookmark it; that way you would be close to the last page.

Anyway, I'm not expert so don't take what I say as an absolute truth.

EDIT: ninja'd. At least, I were right
